entry.title: [SBG3][Dedicated Servers] - S336A07
entry.content:
Nov 11, 10:56 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 11/11/2022 11:47 UTC
End Time : 11/11/2022 11:55 UTC
Root cause : Our technical teams resolved the issue.
Public network on this rack S336A07 reachable again.

Nov 11, 10:54 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 11/11/2022 11:47 UTC
Service impact : The public network on this rack S336A07 is currently unvailable.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating on the issue.
Update will be post as significant progress is made.
